item.description:
Hugo & I will be checking out the Concord Dog Park. Anyone else want to join us?

Bring water & poop bags - no water available at the park.

Check out our member comments from the message board.

DIRECTIONS (see the photo for this meetup: it is a map of the area)

Rte 93 North.
Take exit 13 and bear right onto manchester st
get in the far left lane right away
then at the upcoming lights, almost immediately, take a left onto old turnpike rd.
as soon as the lane divider ends on old turnpike road, just after you turn onto O.T.Road, on the Right there is a dirt road to a dirt parking area, you can see the fences of the dog park. it is directly across the road from a small car dealer. (you kind of have to drive over double yellow lines, so if there is traffic you might have to wait or go to the next entrance.) if you miss the first parking area, there is another parking area, the next right on old turnpike road. there is a tiny sign for Terrill Park. just park and walk the path to the fenced areas.

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Concord Dog Park
